question: [File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: batch_execute_withdraw()] [Zero Address Batch Handling] If multiple withdrawals have zero addresses, can claimable_principal accounting become corrupted? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: batch_execute_withdraw()] [Partial Execution] If one withdrawal fails mid-batch, what happens to already-executed withdrawals? Can this be exploited? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: batch_execute_withdraw()] [Index_of Failure Handling] If request_id not found in vector, does the function panic leaving vault in inconsistent state? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: batch_execute_withdraw()] [Gas Limit Attack] Can large batches cause out-of-gas preventing withdrawals and locking user funds? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: cancel_user_withdraw()] [Share Return Manipulation] Since function returns u256 shares, can this value be used to exploit share accounting if caller ignores the return value? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: cancel_user_withdraw()] [Receipt ID Bypass] Can operator provide wrong receipt_id to cancel withdrawals for other users, stealing their shares? (Critical)
[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: cancel_user_withdraw()] [Recipient Address Manipulation] Can operator redirect cancelled shares to wrong recipient address? (Critical)
[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: cancel_user_withdraw()] [Locking Window Bypass] Can cancellation occur during locking windows when it should be prevented? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: cancel_user_withdraw()] [Clock Parameter Manipulation] Can wrong clock parameter allow cancellation outside allowed time windows? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: deposit_by_operator()] [Share Minting Exploit] Can operator deposit and receive shares at manipulated oracle prices, diluting other shareholders? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: deposit_by_operator()] [Oracle Timing Attack] Can operator time deposits when oracle prices are stale or manipulated to get favorable share rates? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: deposit_by_operator()] [Zero Amount Deposit] Can operator deposit 0 amount coins causing accounting issues or bypassing certain checks? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: deposit_by_operator()] [Frozen Operator Timing] Can operator execute deposit right before being frozen, or does freeze check have race conditions? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: add_new_coin_type_asset()] [Type Collision Attack] Can operator add asset types that collide with existing types, corrupting vault state? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: add_new_coin_type_asset()] [Malicious Asset Type] Can operator add malicious coin types that have hooks or reentrancy vectors? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: add_new_coin_type_asset()] [Frozen Operator Check] Can a frozen operator still add new asset types through timing or race conditions? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: remove_coin_type_asset()] [Asset Balance Check] Can operator remove coin type asset while vault still holds balance of that type, causing locked funds? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: remove_coin_type_asset()] [Active Position Removal] If DeFi protocols hold positions with this asset type, can removal cause loss of access? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: remove_coin_type_asset()] [Type Confusion] Can removing and re-adding same asset type cause accounting confusion? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: add_new_defi_asset()] [Index Collision] Can operator add defi asset with idx that already exists, overwriting existing asset and causing loss? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: add_new_defi_asset()] [Asset Ownership] Does function verify that operator owns the asset being added, or can they add assets they don't control? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: add_new_defi_asset()] [Type Constraint Bypass] Can operator add assets that don't meet the `key + store` constraint through generics manipulation? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: add_new_defi_asset()] [Malicious Asset Object] Can operator add malicious objects that exploit vault when accessed later? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: remove_defi_asset_support()] [Asset in Use] Can operator remove DeFi asset while it's being used in an active operation, causing operation failure? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: remove_defi_asset_support()] [Index Out of Bounds] Can providing invalid idx cause panic or return wrong asset? (Medium)
